items.sentence: Is the post office within walking distance from here?

It was much more difficult than we initially thought.
It was so hot that I thought I was going to pass out.
Tom and Mary are finally talking to each other again.
Tom and Mary are going to play tennis this afternoon.

I don\'t ever want Tom to write to my daughter again.
I figured you\'d probably never want to see me again.
